title: Horrible Lag
body: I've never lagged as bad as I have been recently. Ping spikes up to 1000-1300 and stays at a constant 250-650. If I updated to the new client would that help?

replies.body: Damn, that's pretty high!  It sounds like you might be having network problems like packet loss causing sudden high spikes like that.  It's more related to your connection and not the client, which is totally independent from the game itself.  You should run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to confirm, as well as get some steps to help.  Let me know what you find!
